Package life.expert.riso.app

Interface OutputHelper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ShellOutputHelper
    public interface OutputHelper
    Designed for console output to a typical screen or its virtual substitute I make the assumption that the size of the canvas is not more than the length of a single text screen 80 characters , what acceptable to most console users. The following are the corresponding constants: MAX_SCREEN_SIZE, MIN_SCREEN_SIZE
